strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Reposition the container to ensure the spout is properly aligned with the target container.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Adjust the angle of the pitcher to ensure the liquid flows directly into the glass.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Reduce the speed of pouring to have better control and avoid spillage.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Pour more slowly when transferring liquid from a high bottle to a small cup.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Ensure the container is stable and firmly held to prevent slipping or tilting during pouring.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Place the container on a flat surface before pouring to prevent accidental tipping.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Stop pouring momentarily to reassess and correct the position of the container or spout.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Pause the pour to ensure the bottle is at the correct angle to avoid overfilling.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Use a funnel or similar tool to guide the liquid into a narrow target container, reducing the risk of spills.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Use a funnel when pouring oil into a small bottle to prevent overflow.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Adjust the angle of the container to reduce the risk of splashing or over-pouring.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Adjust the angle of the teapot when pouring to avoid drips or spills.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Switch to a different container that is easier to control for pouring, such as using a smaller or more ergonomic vessel.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Switch from a large jug to a smaller pitcher for easier pouring into glasses.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Wipe the spout after pouring to prevent drips or residual liquid from spilling outside the target container.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Wipe the edge of a bottle or jug with a cloth to stop drips from falling.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Use a measuring cup or graduated container to pour the correct amount of liquid with precision.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Use a measuring cup to pour exact quantities of milk into a recipe to avoid spillage.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: If spillage occurs, pause the task, clean up the mess, and reassess the pouring method to prevent further issues.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Stop immediately if liquid spills, clean the area, and resume with a more controlled pouring technique.
